website_summaries.verdict: An extremely sharp set of four round-tip utility knives that feature brightly colored handles.
pros: Don't let the friendly colors mislead you, this set of knives is razor sharp
Crafted in Switzerland by master cutlers, these 4.5-inch serrated knives will slice effortlessly through everything
Additionally, the knives come with a lifetime warranty so you can purchase with confidence
cons: The handles of this set of knives may be a little small for individuals with larger hands

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp and, uh, colorful
customer_reviews.text: We needed a set of knives and these were the only ones without a point on the end. We don't mind the silly colors. They look like kid toys and are very light. Each of the knives weighed out to barely 1 ounce. But the knives are SHARP. When we bought them we knew nothing about the company and its long history. Persoanally I would prefer the same knives without the bubble gum colors.
customer_reviews.author: CenVillager

customer_reviews.title: Good except for being rounded at the end
customer_reviews.text: Victorinox makes good knives. They're an excellent value. That's why I bought these. Before these, I never had knives that were rounded at the end. I know what the purpose is, but I think the pointed ones are actually safer. With these rounded ones, I have to adjust the cutting angle -- because there's not point -- and end up cutting myself. That never happens with the pointed ones.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Faith 99

customer_reviews.title: Stays Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these brand of knives that I have always loved. I have had them FOREVER and they NEVER dull. They are super sharp as well! It never occurred to me to look on Amazon and see if the same brand as the ones I currently have were for sale here - and to my amazement they are! Extremely sharp out of the box, and if they're anything like the ones I have used in years past, these bad boys do. not. dull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for young chefs!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to feel a bit safer with my kids helping me in the kitchen. Still a sharp knife, but without the pointed tip. These feel like they could be a bit flimsy if used roughly, but have held up well so far, are super light weight, and the kids enjoy using them. They've gone through the dishwasher a couple times already without problems. I'll update if we encounter problems in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kerriann

customer_reviews.title: Sharp utility knife set at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these several years ago, and they have remained sharp and wash well in my dishwasher. I recently bought another set as I was happy with my original purchase. One must be careful as they are sharp, and I did cut myself a few times with the original set, but I do find them very useful in the kitchen. I do not mind the bright colors, especially as I keep one just for slicing onions and garlic, and thus I avoid other food tasting of onion.
customer_reviews.author: Pompom

customer_reviews.title: They cut through anything!
customer_reviews.text: I was given a single one of these by a family friend and fell in love with how versatile and sharp they are. They literally cut through anything and with such ease. We lost the one that was gifted so after looking for a replacement I ended up finding out the manufacturer and bought this set without hesitation and they have not failed in the slightest. Definitely worth the buy and whenever they lose or if they ever lose sharpness I'll buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift for your kitchen afficionado!
customer_reviews.text: A friend had a couple of the little Victorinox knives for many YEARS, but one was lost and the other overused as it was his favorite kitchen tool. He had his birthday last night and when he received this gift, I could have given him $1000. and I don't think he would have been as pleased. His face lit-up like there was no tomorrow. He was showing off his new swiss peeler during his virtual birthday party last night on Zoom. Perfect gift, especially if the lucky guy or gal already knows how good these darn things work! Can't beat swiss-made quality and Demovid-free, too!
customer_reviews.author: chartel

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Knives for Pic Nics and More
customer_reviews.text: What this knife is - an economical utility knife good for a variety of tasks like making a sandwich, from slicing the bread to spreading the condiments. I bought the pack as I wanted such a handy tool in my camping gear, my kitchen, and at work. The price is right for the product. It's well made, but this knife is not a high-end gourmet tool. Which makes it ok if one of your co-workers absconds with it...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best everyday knives
customer_reviews.text: These are the best everyday knives. They don't look like much and they're definitely not dressy but, boy, do they work. I use them all the time. I have lost a couple by accidentally throwing them away with the compostables (argh!) so I ordered replacements right away. I'm thinking I need to stockpile them just in case they become extinct! Fun colors, too. Good and comfortable grip, perfect length, good for everything from chopping veggies to steaks to cheese. I've had them for years and, although they're not as sharp as they were in the beginning (beware how you handle them when you first get them) they are still great. Gee, I sound like a sales representative. Whatever. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Niervana

customer_reviews.title: I pretty much use this knife all the time..
customer_reviews.text: I really like this knife. Super sharp, cuts easily through meat, fruits, vegetables and bread. I have a couple of expensive larger knives which I now barely ever use. I even use these on watermelons they’re that good. I bought the multipack because my sons thought they were amazing so now they each have one at their homes. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ron R

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Given how useful these utility knives are, it's nice to keep a few around. I use them for peeling pineapple (you want a slightly flexible knife like these), cutting cheese, even slicing vegetables when my chef's knife is otherwise occupied. The tang is well-seated in the handle, at least for an inexpensive plastic knife, and the blade is quite sharp. It's going to last a few years. Great value. If you already have a basic set of really good knives, this is a great complement.
customer_reviews.author: I. Kahn Teeter-Totter

customer_reviews.title: be careful -- these knives are very sharp (that's a good thing)
customer_reviews.text: These are good knives to have in a kitchen. They cut fruit, They cut vegetables, they even cut bread. The handle is comfortable, the colors blend in skillfully with most decors. They do everything you'd expect a small general-purpose kitchen knife to do. We are glad we bought them. (Maybe this company might also make a decent army knife......)
customer_reviews.author: S. V. Pollack (shepsl)

customer_reviews.title: but they do a great job slicing
customer_reviews.text: These ARE Extremely SHARP!! So I must be extra careful, but they do a great job slicing!!! I had to search a bit to find knives like these without a sharp point. I'm VERY PLEASED with this purchase. These arrived quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: kicks10

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knives
customer_reviews.text: As I am already familiar with the high quality of Victorinox Knives, my high expectations to Victorinox were fulfilled again. I use these mostly for eating rather than preparing food, as their serrated edges are perfectly suited for steaks, sausages or anything else where you want to have a proper edge. The serrated edge also will keep them sharp for a really long time and i never had to resharpen them despite daily use. I have been eating with expensive steak knives too, but these Victorinox knives beat them all. Additionally, they also add a colourful touch on the table. I am so convinced of these Victorinox products, that I usually gift them to friends on special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Best General Purpose Kitchen Knives
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding general purpose utility knives. We had one for years and lost it. Replaced with these 4 last year. Not a minute passes in our kitchen without these knives. Highly recommend for most general purpose tasks. Retains sharpness for very long. Store don't carry these inexpensive, yet highly valuable knives. Great to find in Amzn. I'd give a 10 stars to these, if Amzn had an option.
customer_reviews.author: TruthSword

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knives, excellent swiss product
customer_reviews.text: I got this after purchasing a Victorinox pair knife, which turned out really sharp and easy to use. It's an excellent swiss brand. So far, they cut amazing and are light weight. I also like the colours cause are easy to spot in the drawer
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So great we had to gift them
customer_reviews.text: These knives are excellent. I know that they are marketed as "utility knives" in some places and "Steak Knives" by others, but they are truly utility knives. We have used them for everything. They are SUPER sharp, but the metal isn't the most durable so make sure you have a good cutting surface if you want them to last a while. They are so awesome that our visiting in-laws asked where we got them and we just ordered them a set. And so did my sister for her in-laws.
customer_reviews.author: David&Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Best knives ever BUT they are very sharp, be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how much I love and use these knives. We can cut all soft fruits and veg with ease. Cutting very thin slices of onions is much easier than a standard knife. I adore a serrated knife but my others are big and awkward. These are used every day don't hesitate
customer_reviews.author: Diane Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, genuine Swiss-made knives, very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knives, I bought these to replace a knife that I bought in Germany 8 years ago that I might have thrown out accidentally. I use them as steak knives, butter knives, etc., and they’re very sharp. They are genuine Swiss-made Victorinox knives, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Victorinox Kitchen Knives are Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying one or another version of these for years because they are super sharp and easy to use for so many applications in the kitchen. While I think some people know how to sharpen them, I just use them until they have lost their edge. The bright colors are lovely and the knives are easy to identify in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Star

customer_reviews.title: Favorite overall kitchen knife
customer_reviews.text: I have three sets of these and they are terrific. I keep ordering more because when I go to grab one, they are all already in the dishwasher. They are the first to be used for almost all kitchen purposes. They stay sharp forever, and the serrated edges make them excellent for slicing everything from tomatoes to english muffins. The blades are wide enough to do a good job at spreading jam or peanut butter. They are safe to use, and are a real bargain. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rubel

customer_reviews.title: These knives know how to cut!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Victorinox knives for many years. They cut so well without their blade getting dull. I use them mainly for slicing vegetables and fruits, and there is no knife that can compete with them. And the price is really good - worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Dotan

customer_reviews.title: Favorite knives 💕
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of these little bread knives. They are very sharp and great for slicing citrus fruit and bread alike. I had purchased one in Austria a couple years ago and was delighted to see them offered on Amazon in this set of four colors.
customer_reviews.author: Pam H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knives! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives. I’ve had one for a few years now and decided I need more since I end up using it almost exclusively in the kitchen and I wash it about 10 times a day since I always use it. The ones I got are all the same and are very very sharp. Great for cutting vegetables and meats!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: A Sailors Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp, but knew that already. Great for kitchen or real dirty work. Does not come with sheaths to carrry them, but cuts through mooring lines like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Octovar

customer_reviews.title: Work great & love to use them
customer_reviews.text: I just love these knives! Bought another set as I would run out of them. I like that they are sharp but don't have a sharp tip. Just super comfy to use. Not the best looking I have to say...but they are easy to find in my kitchen drawer!
customer_reviews.author: E. Beratlis

customer_reviews.title: My go to knife
customer_reviews.text: I got this knife at a work training as a gift last year and everyone in my family uses it when they need a knife. It cuts everything easily I really love these. Not a huge fan of the colors and was afraid their black knives would be different.
customer_reviews.author: diane Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: These knives are deceptively amazing
customer_reviews.text: With their colorful handles and rounded edges, these knives look almost like toys. In fact, they are the most versatile and the sharpest knives in my kitchen. I've been using them for years, and I just bought more as gifts to my adult children who grew up with them. My wife and I agree that they are our favorite kitchen implements.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hertzberg

customer_reviews.title: Finally a replacement for my SHELL Station (giveaway)  knives
customer_reviews.text: After 40 years my SHELL serrated knives are no longer functional. Delighted to find these knives. Love that the blade is thin but cuts very well. The bright colors make them easy to find in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Pardee

customer_reviews.title: SHARP
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with knives. Usually use a steak knife when a serrated knife is needed for cutting tomatoes and similar food. These are a bit longer and really sharp. Colors are pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen knife ever
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a couple of these knives for years. They are simply the best. I use them for everything. Cutting tomatoes, steak...everything. They are still as sharp as the day i purchased them. I love them so much I bought this 4 pack so id have more.
customer_reviews.author: John B. West

customer_reviews.title: Best cutting knives for vegetables, fruits, bread, and meat.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot live without these knives. I prefer the rounded end tip above the pointed one. The knives are easy to handle and cut fruit, vegetables, bread, and steaks very easily. The handle of the knives are not slippery and one can easily control the cutting action with one's hand. Overall impressed and will always be a loyal customer for Victorinox Swiss Classic knives!!
customer_reviews.author: FAB777

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knives - must use caution!
customer_reviews.text: BE Careful!!!! The first 3 times I used these knives, I cut myself and didn’t even know it until I saw blood on my kitchen countertops. Cut very well.... but should be used with caution!
customer_reviews.author: KORTNEY B

customer_reviews.title: Terrific knives
customer_reviews.text: These serrated knives are sharp and efficient. The handles are easy to use as is the rounded tip--for grapefruit sections and such. I've had at least one of these knives in my house for 20+ years. I got these for Christmas from hubby and now I'm set for life!
customer_reviews.author: Thonie Hevron

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PRODUCT.  THESE ARE THE STANDARD.
customer_reviews.text: Made in Switzerland (Yahoo!). These are perfect knives - sharp, functional, nothing fancy, inexpensive. They are all we use. I've bought these several times and given some away. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Analytical Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Good knives
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of knives. I have bought a few different sizes. I'm not an expert on knives but I've had to feed myself for over 50 yrs and these make preparing food very easy for me. And a very fair price for something that works well. I'm easy on them and take care of them, so they're doing fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sharp little knife
customer_reviews.text: These are light easy to use sharp small knifes. I own about 15 of them. I use at least 3 a day. Very dishwasher safe. The handle does not fade. Love it. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: a vaske

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Best knife purchase ever! We use this on a daily basis and it is still sharp and in excellent condition. I bought this is a present for my friend. She loved it so much, she shared it with her family as well. I love it and highly recommend it 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: very sharp
customer_reviews.text: These knives are extremely sharp. My knives had a sticky tape on them to remove which I did not care for - would have preferred just little cardboard sleeves. Pretty colors. Would be nicer with a soft handle I think.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader U.S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knives
customer_reviews.text: Buy these for yourself or as a gift. They're great knives - sharp and they cut anything. My teenager loves them. Also inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Best knives out there for this price!
customer_reviews.text: These knives make for excellent general purpose kitchen knives. I have used them for everything from cutting through hard sourdough crust to thinly slicing tomatoes. They feel great in the hand and the brights colors is helps them stand out in my cutlery drawer. I don't think there are better, more versatile knives available for this price point. I bought a second set after 2 weeks of use. 9/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: knives were very sharp
customer_reviews.text: the knives came brand new and very sharp. the only downside is the don't come with a reusable sleeve to cover them when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Knife is sharp and holds its edge.
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive knife set, all of the items work very well. The two knives have both held their cutting edge and continue to cut cleanly and remain sharp without the need for resharpening. The small cutting boar has a very usable surface and it cleans up very nicely after use. So far, I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Silver

customer_reviews.title: Buy more! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: The only knife I use now. Buy a box of bandages to go with them, especially if you have been using knives that aren't sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful in the kitchen or on the table
customer_reviews.text: These are kind of fun due to the various colors, they are very sharp, good for any use in the kitchen, and do well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: KAD

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a better set of knives! I use these for everything! I have had one for almost 8 years and they are still the sharpest knife I have! They are super sharp so be careful not to cut you self cause they cut everything like butter. Completely effortless. Don’t even think twice to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Logan Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp knives
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp knives. Be careful! I cut myself 2 times by Norma being a bit careless.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Love these versatile knives
customer_reviews.text: I have previously ordered a small set with a paring knife and this serated knife. I found myself always going into the dishwasher to get this one and decided to order extras. Great knives (watch out, they are SHARP!) at a super price.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: LIght and colorful!
customer_reviews.text: I really do like these steak knives. They are very colorful and lightweight. I had an older set with only blue handles, but I mix both sets together and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Which colour do I choose to use?!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp and lively bright colours!! Only problem is when I need to use a knife which colour do I choose!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No other knives quite like this
customer_reviews.text: My first one from the 1980's is still perfect and used every day. Got these for when its in the dishwasher. Love the colours and the blade precisely as expected. Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanetta

customer_reviews.title: Great knives!
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives! They cut very well and are lightweight! Just what I was looking for! Going to get another set for our church kitchen too.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: The sharpest knife I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have a full set of Victorinox Cutlery and my favorite knife is the Tomato knife. I used it for everything and just bought these multicolored so I'd be able to find them easily I also gave one to my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: gooddeals711

customer_reviews.title: Sharpest paring knives
customer_reviews.text: The sharpest paring knives i have ever owned. I love these knives. They will slice a tomato super thin. Just watch your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Great All purpose kitchen knife
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good pricing. I love the assorted colors. I’d like the option to choose all of another color aside from yellow.
customer_reviews.author: O_linds

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these and was surprised at how sharp they are, careful! Ordered a 2nd set and was shorted one knife. Amazon made it super easy to correct. Love the multi colors. If you want a super sharp knife this is it!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Never had such a knife. It looks a bit flimsy, but it cuts easily through basically anything.
customer_reviews.author: В.Ш.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp, colorful knives!
customer_reviews.text: Very (very, be careful) sharp kitchen knives and the bright handles make them easy to find in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Good knives and good price
customer_reviews.text: These knives are super sharp. Easy to find in the drawer. We all use them every day and are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olinda

customer_reviews.title: I love these and strange as it may sound I actually ...
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have lost count of the amount of money I have spent on knives. But this is te only brand that delivers on every single promise. My last paid of Knives that I had last me for nine years and they still are as sharp as new. I love these and strange as it may sound I actually gifted these knives to my friends who just LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: Great knives
customer_reviews.text: They are sharp knives good for using in the kitchen. Really like them
customer_reviews.author: TexasCae

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted. The bright colors make them easy to find in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Abbay

customer_reviews.title: My favorite knives
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and colorful. But be very careful as they are super sharp. I have been using them for over 4 yrs and still sharp. They can even slice tomatos perfectly without mushing them up.
customer_reviews.author: Kav

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp. Colorful. Makes for a great steak knife or everyday paring knife
customer_reviews.author: SnoHo 4x4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to knives. They are staying sharp. I have purchased several sets. You won't go wrong if you get this set!
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. George

customer_reviews.title: Best all around knife.
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for 10+ years now for everything, literally everything. There is absolutely nothing this knife can't cut with ease. I am blown away but these, and continue buying new ones every 5 years or so. I would not leave a review for just a good product... only for the best... this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Plenty Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my kids to use in the kitchen because it's lightweight, has a rounded tip, and is still sharp enough to cut things without having to use too much pressure. The kids loved the bright colors and enjoy using them. However, proper technique must be taught otherwise one can easily cut a finger.
customer_reviews.author: Luoliyang

customer_reviews.title: A sharp knife is a safe knife
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives. They are super sharp and do not take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie L. C.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey, but these knives will last you a very long time. To me, they are the best knives you will ever use.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly68

customer_reviews.title: Next time I’ll get Black
customer_reviews.text: I gave a 4 only because of the color- I should of gotten the black. These color knives cheapen the look of them. Even tho they are the same great same knives.
customer_reviews.author: Bright spot

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: These little babies are the sharpest little rascals I have ever met. You apply so little pressure when you slice any veggie
customer_reviews.author: Maziar S.

customer_reviews.title: look cheap but good quality
customer_reviews.text: cheap plastic looking knife but cuts like a mofo. very sharp. great for cutting onions and tomatoes, easily halves chicken breast, very versatile, very sharp. They hold up well for quite awhile too. I have about 7 of these. One is 3 years old and still sharp AF.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great knives!
customer_reviews.text: love these knives. never lose their sharpness great for git giving!
customer_reviews.author: cornwallres.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous knives for the price. I love the rounded tip because I can put it in my lunch box without poking a hole in it. Dishwasher safe is a plus.. They are so sharp that they could be used as a surgical scalpel. They cut through tomatoes very cleanly.. The downside is they are VERY sharp - we have had three cut fingers so far, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great little knives for every day
customer_reviews.text: These seem cheap with the plastic handles, but are extremely sharp and useful. Good in the dishwasher, too.
customer_reviews.author: customerW

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: These knives are great, multipurpose knives for the kitchen. They are lightweight and very sharp. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dancerella

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp! And love the fun colors to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp! And love the fun colors to go with my Fiestaware dishes. Just be careful with them, I have had to use a few bandaids since I wasn't being as mindful as I should have. I also use these for kitchen prep of everything from raw meat (including cutting up an entire chicken), paring vegetables, and cutting up fruits (including and entire pineapple.) Phenomenal knives.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oak Tree

customer_reviews.title: Best all purpose knife
customer_reviews.text: These replaced our 25 year old one and not because it needed replacing. Our son took it to college. Love using it for bread rolls and especially for tomatoes. Works great as a steak knife too. Our favorite knife. I expect to get another +25 years out of this set.
customer_reviews.author: Birgit Matyssek

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: These are such good knives.....the serated edge is great for cutting bread or anything! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Best knifes in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these knives so much this is my second set and NOT because the others are worn out! NO!! They're just like new. Because I use them so very much I run out of clean ones so ... I needed more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice knives
customer_reviews.text: Cut nicely, nice grip feel and sharp! And dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: MACJAC

customer_reviews.title: sharp
customer_reviews.text: bought one of these in Germany and we came home and bought a set. Love how it handles, cuts great, goes in the dishwasher with no problem. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives
customer_reviews.text: These knives are worth every dollar, the quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: GAS

customer_reviews.title: Great knives very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Nice quality and very sharp. Packaging was odd, hard to peel off protective stickers covering the blades. But great once I got them off.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Really a great knife that we use over and over again
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this brand of knife for quite a while and need to replenish our supply ever now and again to replace the ones we give away. Really a great knife that we use over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Half Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives! They're so sharp that I retired my steak knives, which were much more expensive, and am only using these now. What a find!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest and best knifes I'm my household Really sharp will cut anything
customer_reviews.author: Yaroslav

customer_reviews.title: Best knives ever!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are the best I’ve ever used, especially for cutting and peeling fruits and vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate- buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are amazing. They look a little cheap with the bright plastic handles but the blade is superb. They have blunt rounded tips but have many uses as a go to knife in the kitchen- I bought as gifts for family.
customer_reviews.author: Delaware resident

customer_reviews.title: KNIFE SET
customer_reviews.text: GREAT KNIVES. WOULD RECOMMEND THEM TO ANY ONE. REFEREED TO ME BY MY SISTER. I HAVE PURCHASED THEM IN COLOR AND IN BLACK FOR THREE OTHERS SO FAR.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Its really nice and sturdy. Sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Archana

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp. Perfect to slice Tomato or Sushi
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to slice tomato or Sushi. Be careful because it is super sharp
customer_reviews.author: C Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Knives!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knives. Very sharp. Can cut anything. Do a great job, would spend a lot of money on these. If only they had cooler colors
customer_reviews.author: Ari Solomon

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to hold and I love the curved tips so ...
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these knifes in Germany several years ago and use them for everything. They are easy to hold and I love the curved tips so I don't cut myself when using or hand-washing them. They are very sharp and cut through meat, vegetables, fruit and bread with very little effort. I love the bright colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Gail B

customer_reviews.title: My go to knife.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best knives. I spend a lot of time in the kitchen and these are my go to knives for everything. I also love the brightly colored Handel....it makes them so easy to find. I have given many of these knives away to friends and family and they all love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cakesalot50

customer_reviews.title: very thin knife
customer_reviews.text: the knife were not as thick and sturdy as my Kuhn serrated knife,but of course they are half the price
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Quality knives
customer_reviews.text: I own/have owned other Victorinox knives including this type. These are the same great quality. They are sharp and if past experience is true they will keep their sharpness over time.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: Best Knifes!
customer_reviews.text: I was given one as gift, it stays sharp and cuts everything. My son who had worked on Tugboats told me that was the only knife they use in the galley. I like the colors too! The ones on boats are white/utility standard but the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: They are my favorite. I have gotten rid of all my old small knives.
customer_reviews.author: Farrow

customer_reviews.title: Super useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace knives a friend brought from Germany 20 years ago that have gradually been lost to family and friends. I use this type of knife for everything. These are excellent quality but a word of warning. They are VERY SHARP! Slice onions paper thin but also slice fingers. Guess I'd gotten used to dull knives. Definitely recommend them but be careful.
customer_reviews.author: JKC

product_meta.title: Victorinox 6.7836.4US1 Swiss Classic 4-Piece Utility Knife Set, 4-Inch, Assorted colors
product_meta.description:
Style:4-Piece Utility Set

The new Swiss Classic collection VICTORINOX SWISS ARMY HAS BEEN MAKING LEGENDARY SWISS ARMY KNIVES SINCE 1897. GUESS WHAT WE MADE BEFORE THAT.
When Karl Elsener created the first Swiss Army Knife, he had no idea that he had just invented the symbol of Swiss ingenuity for generations to come. As a Master Cutler, he was only doing what came naturally. Karl had opened his cutlery factory 13 years before in Ibach, a village in northern Switzerland. By the time he dreamed up the world's first pocket tool, his cutlery business was already booming.

As it was then, Cutlery by Victorinox Swiss Army is today the first choice of professionals right down the line - as ubiquitous in the bustling meat-packing plants of the Midwest as it is in the gleaming, four-star restaurant kitchens of Midtown Manhattan.

You don't have to be a professional to appreciate our beautifully balanced, perfectly weighted, razor-sharp tools. But you can now put them to work just the same.

Victorinox Swiss Army has been handcrafting the finest blades since 1884.

7-Inch Blade Granton Edge 6-Inch Blade Narrow Flex 10-1/4-Inch Blade, Serrated 10-1/4-Inch Blade, Granton Edge VICTORINOX SWISS ARMY'S SUPERIOR BLADES
 *  Mirrored polish finish on high-carbon stainless steel blade
 * Laser tested for world-renowned sharpness and edge retention
 * Blades are conically ground for ease of cutting and won�t discolor or corrode
 * Holds a 56 HRC (Rockwell hardness)

FEATURES & BENEFITS OF THE SWISS CLASSIC COLLECTION
 * New contemporary handle is inspired by our professional Fibrox Pro handle
 * Lightweight, balanced and perfect for the home kitchen
 * Handles are made from Fibrox-a patented material that is durable, ergonomically designed to fit the hand, slip resistant and hygienic
 * The entire collection is NSF (National Sanitary Foundation)approved

3-1/4-Inch Paring, Straight 3-1/4-Inch Paring, Serrated 5-Inch Chef's Knife 6-Inch Chef's Knife 8-Inch Chef's Knife 10-Inch Chef's Knife 7-piece block set 7-PIECE BLOCK SET
INCLUDES:
 * 3-1/4-inch paring, straight
 * 3-1/4-inch paring, serrated
 * 4-1/2-inch serrated utility
 * 8-inch chef's
 * 9-inch honing steel
 * Kitchen shears
 * Slant hardwood block

3-piece chef's set 3-PIECE CHEF'S SET
INCLUDES:
 * 8-inch chef's
 * 8-inch slicer
 * 3-1/4-inch parer

WHY CHOOSE VICTORINOX SWISS ARMY CUTLERY 
 * Manufactured in Switzerland since 1884
 * A fourth-generation family-owned business
 * The #1 selling brand to professionals
 * The ultimate precision in the art of cooking at home
 * Exceptional price/value relationship
 * Has a 92% brand recognition, due to the legendary Swiss Army Knife
 * Consistently named "Best Value" by leading consumer magazines
